sections.purpose: To measure elapsed time for analytical procedures and reaction monitoring.
sections.scope: Applicable to timing tasks in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Press 'RESET' to clear any previous time readings.
Press 'START' at the beginning of the timed event.
Press 'STOP' once the event is completed.
Record the measured time in the logbook or batch record.
Reset the watch for the next use.
Turn OFF the watch if it has a power switch to save battery.
Clean the watch with a dry cloth periodically.
precautions: Do not handle the stop watch with wet or chemical-stained hands.
Check the battery status regularly to ensure reliability.
Avoid exposing the watch to extreme heat or magnetic fields.
Store the stop watch in its protective case when not in use.
Verify the timing accuracy against a standard clock annually.
